column6:
Someone is using stolen Stark Industries technology to take control of Marvel's most high-tech heroes and villains. Sounds like the perfect time for Power Pack to attend an exhibit of old Iron Man armor! Nothing could possibly go wrong there... right? Part 1 of 2. Plus...MINI MARVELS!,2008,1
All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Gurihiru | inker:Marcelo DiChiara | letterer:Dave Sharpe | writer:Marc Sumerak
